title: Teacher Leadership Competency Enhancement Program Applying Critical Pedagogy

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Science Education Knowledge and Fundamental Leadership Competencies as a Manager
context.additional_context: Corporate education managers/leaders require critical pedagogical perspectives to adapt to multicultural classroom environments, with access to digital devices.

learning_goals: Participants can critically analyze power structures and privilege systems inherent in teacher training programs
Participants can design science curricula that reflect the experiences of students from diverse cultural backgrounds
Participants can identify inequities in existing educational systems and propose improvement strategies
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
